articles.content: Virat Kohlis battles against spin continue to fascinate. In the first Test against Bangladesh, he was out taking a leg-stump guard, a trait that hadnt quite worked out for him even in the past. It di… [+9024 chars]

articles.title: Kohli to open for RCB; Mayank to lead SRH?: A look at strongest playing XI of all 10 teams after IPL 2023 auct - Times Now
articles.description: All the 10 franchises plugged the holes in their respective line-ups at the IPL 2023 auction which saw 80 players finding teams with almost Rs 167 crore getting spent. Did all teams find a balanced first XI or are there still a few concerns? Let's take a look…
